    | text      = He read the Koran to them with, obviously, a thin magical thread that he wrote their
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:14.159
    | text      = names into a pillow on in order to control them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:17.039
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:18.039
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:19.039
    | text      = And he wrote a very different version of the story than the accounts that I can find elsewhere.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:23.440
    | text      = He really downplayed those diplomats. He really left them out of the story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:27.599
    | text      = The ones who went in to a hostage situation and tried to appeal to their conscience.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:32.079
    | text      = Right. Right, right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:33.239
    | text      = So this is incredibly complicated for me to make sense of because I can't escape the fact
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:37.599
    | text      = that a March 13th 1977 article in the Eugene Register-Guard does seem to confirm that Steve
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:43.900
    | text      = was involved in the response to the standoff, saying he was, quote, in the picture and,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:48.800
    | text      = quote, working side by side with Police Chief Maurice Collinane.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:53.159
    | text      = At the same time, Jeffrey David Simon's book doesn't mention Steve at all, but it does
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:57.840
    | text      = say, quote, also joining the negotiations were U.S. Attorney for the District of Columbia
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:02.320
    | text      = Earl Silbert and Deputy Attorney General Designee Peter Flaherty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:06.880
    | text      = The book even quotes Police Chief Maurice Collinane, and there's no mention of Steve.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:12.380
    | text      = He mentions the head of the FBI and attorney general being at the command post, but everything
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:16.440
    | text      = we can learn about Steve's involvement comes from his own mouth, either through his telling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:20.480
    | text      = of the story or quotes he's provided to newspapers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:24.199
    | text      = Which I don't I don't know. I mean, he was there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:26.840
    | text      = Right. Right. But if you've got deputies, a attorney, a deputy attorney's general, deputy's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:33.800
    | text      = attorney.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:34.800
    | text      = Yeah, I'm not sure where the plan goes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:37.079
    | text      = Yeah. And then you've got the head of the FBI and then you've got all these other guys.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:43.699
    | text      = Even if he's any one of 06 medical doctor or international relations, P.P.H.D., he's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:54.059
    | text      = still not top billed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:55.900
    | text      = You know, I think if Steve were running the show and he was the one using the Koran to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:00.440
    | text      = everybody would be talking about, I think history would reflect that for sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:04.400
    | text      = But I don't I don't necessarily see it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:06.159
    | text      = I'm not entirely sure. I don't want to discount and take away from the fact that, like, he
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:10.079
    | text      = was there and involved. But I don't know, I think it might be specifically told all
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:15.599
    | text      = of these people to not mention him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:17.920
    | text      = Yeah, don't snitch. Yeah, exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:20.280
    | text      = I don't know. I think what it looks like to me is perhaps an exaggeration of his involvement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:27.719
    | text      = Perhaps it feels like it might be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:29.119
    | text      = I would go with high likelihood of exaggeration.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:32.260
    | text      = So Steve resigned from the State Department on November 7th, 1979, because he was upset
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:38.179
    | text      = with the handling of the Iranian hostage crisis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:40.760
    | text      = Yeah, go home and tell your mothers you're brilliant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:42.960
    | text      = I'm out of here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:43.960
    | text      = Apparently, he wasn't happy that he wasn't called in to resolve the situation, telling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:48.679
    | text      = reporter Georgie Ann Gayer, quote, I had to walk into the operation center on my own after
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:53.679
    | text      = 72 hours.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:55.559
    | text      = This is a little confusing to me, because here we have a guy who's revolutionized the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:59.400
    | text      = entire world of hostage negotiation, who is called in whenever there's a big crisis unfolding,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:04.480
    | text      = who's considered a genius in high-pressure situations, and no one calls him when the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:08.599
    | text      = big game is starting here with this Iranian hostage situation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:12.119
    | text      = That just doesn't track.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:13.840
    | text      = If the people in the State Department knew that they had the king of hostage negotiators
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:17.480
    | text      = at their disposal, there's literally no reason they wouldn't use him when a potentially explosive
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:22.199
    | text      = hostage situation breaks out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:24.760
    | text      = I'm guessing Alex might want to write this off as the State Department secretly not wanting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:28.599
    | text      = the crisis to be diffused, so they keep Steve away from it, knowing that he would easily
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:33.559
    | text      = be able to set things straight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:35.659
    | text      = A more real-world explanation may be that they didn't trust Steve, and that maybe that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:40.599
    | text      = has something to do with his most recent, at that point, high-profile job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:45.519
    | text      = One of the few things we absolutely know Steve was involved in, and that is the botched negotiations
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:50.500
    | text      = to free the kidnapped Italian Prime Minister Aldo Moro.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:54.719
    | text      = This is one of the more documented pieces of Steve's history, and it's crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:01.119
    | text      = It's legitimately insane.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:04.119
    | text      = I can't wait.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:05.519
    | text      = In 1976, Aldo Moro and the Italian Communist Party had joined together in what's now known
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:10.960
    | text      = as the historic compromise, where they began developing a political alliance, where they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:16.280
    | text      = would share governmental power.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:18.000
    | text      = They were going to call it the three-fifths compromise, because it made sense in that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:21.000
    | text      = situation, but then they heard about ours, and they were like, no, no, no, no, no, historic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:25.280
    | text      = It was revolutionary stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:26.760
    | text      = It was one of the first times that Communist parties would be involved in a coalition government
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:34.480
    | text      = up till that point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:36.840
    | text      = Perhaps not coincidentally, the day Moro was kidnapped, he was on his way to Parliament
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:40.559
    | text      = to attend the historic first joint voting of the Christian Democrats and the Communist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:45.599
    | text      = Party.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:46.599
    | text      = The kidnapping severely hurt the Communists, and put this attempt at cooperation completely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:50.480
    | text      = on ice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:51.480
    | text      = Moro had been kidnapped by terrorists on March 16, 1978.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:49:56.139
    | text      = He was ultimately held for 55 days, during which time the Red Brigades gave him a criminal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:00.559
    | text      = trial.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:01.559
    | text      = Apparently, he was found guilty, because on May 9, his body was found in the trunk of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:05.400
    | text      = a car.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:07.320
    | text      = Everybody that I can find specifically points out that the car that he was found in was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:13.400
    | text      = equidistant from the Communist Party and Christian Democrat headquarters, as if it's a message
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:19.320
    | text      = of...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:20.320
    | text      = Oh, man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:21.320
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:22.320
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:23.320
    | text      = I see that written all over the place, and I don't know if it's true, but I don't know
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:28.239
    | text      = what.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:29.239
    | text      = Could be apocryphal, but goddamn, if it's a good image.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:30.239
    | text      = If it's apocryphal, it shows up in every single report.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:34.480
    | text      = Print the legend, Dan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:36.079
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:37.079
    | text      = So for three weeks during this period, Steve Pachannik was secretly working and meeting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:40.980
    | text      = with the Italian authorities and intelligence, helping craft a strategy to negotiate the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:45.280
    | text      = release of Aldo Moro.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:46.960
    | text      = What if we said no?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:48.320
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:49.320
    | text      = However, in April, Steve left Italy and gave up, having decided that Moro was the victim
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:54.280
    | text      = of a setup and that there wasn't anything and anyone in the government that he could
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:58.280
    | text      = really even trust.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:59.719
    | text      = Quote, given the deployment of paramilitary forces, I found it increasingly difficult
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:03.960
    | text      = to believe that they could not find him, that they had no clues to follow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:08.119
    | text      = I realized that the whole situation was compromised.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:10.840
    | text      = What I suspected, and that was why I left early, was that they didn't really care to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:14.880
    | text      = pull Moro out alive.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:16.960
    | text      = This is one version of the story that he's told, that he was just a good guy trying to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:20.599
    | text      = get the job done, but everyone else, they were a bunch of snakes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:24.480
    | text      = I'm gonna go with he got fired.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:29.860
    | text      = That's not the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:30.860
    | text      = Oh, no?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:31.860
    | text      = No, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:32.860
    | text      = Because he still worked at the State Department after this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:34.000
    | text      = No, I mean from the negotiations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:36.219
    | text      = There's no indication that I have of that either.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:38.599
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:39.599
    | text      = I just think maybe things didn't go as planned.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:42.239
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:43.239
    | text      = The story about his involvement in the Moro affair has changed a bit over the years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:47.159
    | text      = In 2008, a documentary was released called, The Last Days of Aldo Moro.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:51.800
    | text      = In the film, Steve admits that the decision was made to let Moro die and that baiting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:56.400
    | text      = the kidnappers into killing him was the only solution available.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:59.719
    | text      = Quote, the decision was made in the fourth week of the kidnapping when Moro's letters
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:03.699
    | text      = became more desperate and he was about to reveal state secrets.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:07.920
    | text      = Hey, assholes, for real.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:10.679
    | text      = Well, that's the position that he was putting forth is like Moro was allowed to write letters
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:15.039
    | text      = back to the government and what have you, and they were getting the tone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:19.519
    | text      = They're like, he's gonna start telling the Red Brigades a bunch of shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:22.760
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:23.760
    | text      = So, Steve, and this is not backed up by anything, correct?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:28.039
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:29.760
    | text      = Steve's saying that the Italian government was literally like, let's let him die?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:33.800
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:34.800
    | text      = You're looking at me with very pregnant eyes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:37.280
    | text      = Well, many people don't believe Steve, which I think is a pretty healthy instinct.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:41.360
    | text      = Yeah, that's a good start.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:42.360
    | text      = However, some people do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:43.679
    | text      = In 2014, the International Business Times reported that quote, prosecutors in Rome said
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:47.960
    | text      = there's serious evidence suggesting Steve Pechenik, a former State Department international
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:52.960
    | text      = crisis manager, participated in the murder that shocked Italy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:57.400
    | text      = Considering he'd more or less admit as much on tape six years prior, I don't think that's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:01.099
    | text      = too shocking of a report.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:02.320
    | text      = Yeah, that sounds right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:03.920
    | text      = Both Steve and Italian Interior Minister Francesco Cosiga have admitted that they released a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:10.480
    | text      = false statement attributed to the kidnappers, known as Communication Number 7, which announced
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:15.760
    | text      = that Moro was dead, though he was still alive in captivity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:19.719
    | text      = Steve admitted that they did this to gauge the public's reaction to news of Moro's death,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:24.440
    | text      = as well as to send a message to the Red Brigades that they didn't care whether Moro lived or
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:28.400
    | text      = died, that they considered him dead already.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:31.539
    | text      = That's fucked up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:33.280
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:34.320
    | text      = That is really, no, you can't do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:38.519
    | text      = We don't have people who do that, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:40.159
    | text      = We got one guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:41.159
    | text      = That's not a thing that you can do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:42.559
    | text      = Nobody's, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:44.739
    | text      = So he literally just sent this message of just like, we're going to be out in front
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:50.820
    | text      = of this story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:52.119
    | text      = We're saying he's dead.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:53.159
    | text      = So you have the option of killing him or making him the fucking Jesus.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:58.539
    | text      = Those are your options.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:59.539
    | text      = Moro.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:00.539
    | text      = Red Brigades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:01.539
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:02.539
    | text      = That's Steve's idea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:03.539
    | text      = Hey.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:04.539
    | text      = Well, we don't know if it's Steve's idea, but he participated in it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:07.280
    | text      = It could have been the Interior Minister who came up with this, but Steve seems to relish
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:12.599
    | text      = in it as a good idea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:14.119
    | text      = So this is...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:15.119
    | text      = And this was not known for quite a while.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:18.300
    | text      = When I mentioned that that article, a lot of his bio comes from, it involves the Aldo
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:23.099
    | text      = Moro kidnapping, this stuff is not, it's not public at this point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:27.840
    | text      = He's presenting a different version of the events that happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:31.519
    | text      = So other people are like, ah, this guy, ah, he doesn't know what he's talking about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:36.619
    | text      = And then the International Business Times is like, oh, that dude murdered a dude.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:41.400
    | text      = Later this information came out and both of them have admitted that they sent this fake
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:45.039
    | text      = communication, which was part of trying to manipulate the kidnappers, which probably
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:50.719
    | text      = led them to not believe that they had a bargaining chip anymore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:55.079
    | text      = Yeah, obviously.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:56.079
    | text      = So to quote Steve, speaking about the Red Brigades, quote, I drew them into a trap where
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:00.440
    | text      = the only thing they could do eventually was kill Aldo Moro.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:04.599
    | text      = Steve literally...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:05.599
    | text      = Yes, I trapped you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:08.440
    | text      = Steve literally says that he did this through a psychological operation, a psy-op.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:13.400
    | text      = Steve's goal was not to free Aldo Moro.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:15.639
    | text      = His goal was to protect the established power structure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:18.159
    | text      = And once it got to a point where it was decided that Moro was a threat, he worked to get Moro
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:22.699
    | text      = killed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:23.699
    | text      = Freeing him wouldn't be advantageous since Moro's letters indicated a feeling of being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:27.119
    | text      = betrayed by his associates, and they worried that if he made it out alive, he would use
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:30.880
    | text      = their inaction to save him against them politically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:36.400
    | text      = Simultaneously, they couldn't take the risk of the Red Brigades not killing Moro, because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:41.000
    | text      = if they kept him alive long enough and treated him well, his animosity toward the people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:45.119
    | text      = who were not rescuing him could grow to the point where he might leak information to the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:48.639
    | text      = Red Brigade to hurt them politically, because he'd get like the Stockholm syndrome kind
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:53.119
    | text      = of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:54.119
    | text      = It was them saying, okay, we're the bad guys here, so let's kill him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:00.360
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:01.360
    | text      = I don't know how to describe it, but I don't know if that's far off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:04.360
    | text      = In order to maintain the status quo, to paraphrase Steve Pechenik, Aldo Moro had to be sacrificed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:11.119
    | text      = In that documentary, The Last Days of Aldo Moro, the filmmakers talked to a couple of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:14.860
    | text      = former members of the Red Brigades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:17.199
    | text      = Here's an excerpt of that documentary where they discuss the interrogations of Moro, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:21.159
    | text      = they were present for.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:23.159
    | text      = The first voice you'll hear is a woman named Adriana Feranda, and the second is a guy named
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:28.000
    | text      = Valerio Morucci, both active members of the Red Brigade.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:32.159
    | text      = Still, or just back down?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:33.599
    | text      = And meanwhile, held in his cell in the Via Montalcini, the hostage is interrogated every
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:38.039
    | text      = day by his Red Brigade kidnappers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:41.000
    | text      = Convinced that the country is politically and economically enslaved, they attempt to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:44.860
    | text      = make him confess to links that exist between the Italian state and multinational companies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:55.719
    | text      = The comrades who interrogated Moro were expecting him to confirm what they had imagined about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:01.159
    | text      = the Italian state.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:05.639
    | text      = To confirm that there existed an imperialist multinational state, and that the United States
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:12.079
    | text      = were the brains behind this vast globalised restructuring.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:23.039
    | text      = In fact, Moro talked about a reality that was much more complex and not so easy to decipher.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:30.360
    | text      = And the comrades quickly felt they were being duped.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:44.599
    | text      = They said that Moro was deliberately not answering their questions, but trying to waste their
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:50.960
    | text      = time, or rather, trying to gain some time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:59.519
    | text      = Our leader, Moretti, couldn't get Moro to give way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:05.159
    | text      = According to him, Moro's answers were partly true, but only partially.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:13.440
    | text      = The reality was much more complex, but for a brigade member, it was incomprehensible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:21.639
    | text      = For us, reality was much more simple.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:24.699
    | text      = There were causes and effects, that's all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:28.440
    | text      = The complexity, the intrigues, the overlapping, the contradictions, we couldn't understand
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:35.280
    | text      = all that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:36.960
    | text      = After a few days, the interrogations stopped and Moro began to write for himself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:42.559
    | text      = He didn't seek to convince us because he understood that in no way did we want to kill him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:50.039
    | text      = He knew that his negotiating partner was now the state, and no longer the Red Brigades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:56.840
    | text      = So who do these Red Brigade people sound like?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:00.639
    | text      = Militant anti-government rebels who believe in a one-world government who refuse to accept
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:05.719
    | text      = any kind of complexity?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:07.639
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:08.639
    | text      = Does it sound like a guy we do a podcast with?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:10.639
    | text      = I can't think of anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:12.760
    | text      = I was just hearing that, just thinking like, oh, isn't that such the way of it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:17.400
    | text      = Do not try and explain complex situations to people who are like, tell us everything
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:23.300
    | text      = we want to hear.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:25.400
    | text      = Do not tell us the truth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:27.360
    | text      = Please.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:28.360
    | text      = Please don't tell us the truth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:29.360
    | text      = Confirm for us all of our paranoid fantasies about how the world works that are based on
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:33.800
    | text      = oversimplifications and black and white thinking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:36.800
    | text      = It's not like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:37.800
    | text      = You've got to understand.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:38.800
    | text      = X, Y, Z.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:39.800
    | text      = Oh, God.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:40.800
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:41.800
    | text      = Can't compute.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:42.800
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:43.800
    | text      = Now we're held hostage by an entire country run by that thought process.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:48.840
    | text      = So in an interview Steve did with the St. Petersburg Times from April 21st, 1978, he's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:53.760
    | text      = pretty clear that he thinks the Moro situation worked out well.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:56.400
    | text      = I killed Moro myself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:58.000
    | text      = Because the government didn't have to resort to extreme actions, which he felt would threaten
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:02.480
    | text      = the credibility and viability of the state.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:05.079
    | text      = Of course, like I said, in 1978, when he's talking to this newspaper, he was pretending
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:10.239
    | text      = that he and Kasinga hadn't sent out fake communication number seven.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:15.119
    | text      = Man, that's fucked up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:16.840
    | text      = That shit's not supposed to happen in real life.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:19.599
    | text      = That's a born identity movie plot right there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:23.039
    | text      = Like that's stupid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:24.440
    | text      = So this went bad from a larger perspective.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:28.480
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:29.480
    | text      = Aldo Moro probably wasn't...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:31.059
    | text      = If you're a hostage negotiator and you're sent in by the State Department at Jimmy Carter's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:36.440
    | text      = behest to go and try and resolve a situation where a head of state of an allied country
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:42.360
    | text      = has been kidnapped by rebels, you don't necessarily want to come out of that with a dead prime
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:47.360
    | text      = minister in the trunk of a car.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:49.519
    | text      = It's not a great thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:51.360
    | text      = So my feeling on it is possibly that Steve Pachanik punted on this, just screwed up,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:58.320
    | text      = and then wasn't involved in the Iranian hostage crisis because he had just been coming off
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:04.000
    | text      = this terrible outing where the fucking prime minister got assassinated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:08.800
    | text      = So here's how I think that would go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:11.639
    | text      = Jimmy Carter is like, hey, let's send some people to help save the prime minister's life.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:18.199
    | text      = And Steve Pachanik is like, okay, I'm going to kill him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:20.980
    | text      = And Jimmy Carter is like, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, you don't understand.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:25.480
    | text      = We want to go save his life.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:27.199
    | text      = And Steve Pachanik is like, I'm going to wink really loudly right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:31.679
    | text      = Did I say that out loud?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:33.159
    | text      = Anyways, I'm going to kill him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:34.679
    | text      = Steve has a lot of quotes also from his past about being a rogue and stuff like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:39.199
    | text      = And so the idea that he might've just been like, I got a fucking crazy idea here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:44.760
    | text      = Let's see if this works.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:49.679
    | text      = He's like a punk hostage negotiator, you know, what's more cool and underground than negotiating
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:55.559
    | text      = the opposite of what you're supposed to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:57.599
    | text      = Man, it's 78.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:58.599
    | text      = Punk is hot at that point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:59.599
    | text      = Yeah, exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:00.599
    | text      = He's talking to them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:01.599
    | text      = He's like, what if we asked you to kill him more?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:04.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:05.639
    | text      = So the other big piece of Steve's resume that always comes up is the Camp David Accords.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:12.280
    | text      = He is always cited as being involved in the Camp David Accords, which took place in September
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:17.800
    | text      = 1978.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:19.400
    | text      = Jimmy Carter brought Israeli Prime Minister Menachem Begin and Egyptian President Anwar
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:24.039
    | text      = Sadat to Camp David to have a peace summit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:26.920
    | text      = Carter, Carter, what if we killed him?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:30.559
    | text      = Without exception, whenever Steve's bio is repeated, it will say that he was, quote,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:34.719
    | text      = instrumental in getting the Accords signed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:37.599
    | text      = And that to me is very interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:39.420
    | text      = It seems entirely likely that Steve could have been at the staff that was there at the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:42.920
    | text      = time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:43.920
    | text      = It's in between the Moro affair and his resignation in 1979, so it's believable that he would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:48.599
    | text      = be there as a State Department attache.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:51.400
    | text      = The problem comes in when you try to define what the word instrumental means, because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:55.280
    | text      = no source I can find that doesn't trace directly back to Steve credits him with being instrumental
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:00.360
    | text      = in the Accords.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:01.360
    | text      = Well, he locked the door behind him when he left the room and the doors are locked from
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:04.719
    | text      = the outside, so they wouldn't even have been able to leave without the Accords.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:09.360
    | text      = He is instrumental in that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:10.840
    | text      = I will say that like a lot of the sources on the Camp David Accords do say like the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:15.880
    | text      = primary goal is not letting them leave without, so if he did lock the doors, you could make
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:21.440
    | text      = the argument that he was instrumental.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:23.719
    | text      = I'm not saying that he wasn't there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:25.159
    | text      = I'm perfectly willing to believe that he was, but I don't know if I trust his depiction
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:29.239
    | text      = of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:30.360
    | text      = Every other source I can find seems to put far more emphasis on Zbigniew Brzezinski's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:34.719
    | text      = involvement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:35.840
    | text      = He seems to be a major player in the negotiations, even down to that famous picture of him playing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:41.440
    | text      = chess against Menachem Begin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:43.360
    | text      = Yeah, one of those people is a historical figure, and then the other one is Zbigniew
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:49.840
    | text      = Brzezinski.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:50.840
    | text      = Like, who even knows who that fucking guy is?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:52.480

    | text      = Quote, a decade ago, he recalled, he was browsing a book fair and happened by a Naval Institute

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:21.420
    | text      = Quote, I picked up this book with a submarine on the cover and paged through it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:26.140
    | text      = Based on his experience as a negotiator, Pacanik thought the author displayed great insight
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = on the Soviets, and the submarine stuff was fantastic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:33.340

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = The book was The Hunt for Red October.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:39.020

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:48.060
    | text      = One of the most popular.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:49.060
    | text      = Jesus.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:50.060

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:59.739

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:00.739
    | text      = Op Center began in 1995 and Net Force in 1999, whereas the character of Jack Ryan debuted
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:05.819

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 01:28:10.300

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:19.779
    | text      = Steve and Tom were the creators of the series, but they didn't write any of the books in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = the Op Center or Net Force series.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:25.939
    | text      = A man named Jeff Rovin wrote most of the Op Center books, and Steve Perry, not the guy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:31.300
    | text      = from Journey, wrote the Net Force ones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:34.359
    | text      = They called the books Tom Clancy's Op Center and Tom Clancy's Net Force, knowing that most
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:39.500
    | text      = people would just assume that meant Clancy had written them, as opposed to just signifying
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:43.579
    | text      = they exist in what I'm going to call the extended Clancyverse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:46.579
    | text      = Yeah, not to be terrible, but I mean, God, I've never made it through half of one of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:52.579
    | text      = his books.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:53.579

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = I'm not sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:55.579
    | text      = I've tried.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:56.579
    | text      = Ah, man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:57.579
    | text      = They make millions of dollars.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:58.579
    | text      = Yeah, oh no.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Of course.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I get it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:08.300
    | text      = And all good things have to come to an end, and the same is true for Steve and Tom's friendship
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = and their business partnership.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:14.939
    | text      = In 1999, Tom Clancy got a divorce, and in the 2005 settlement, his ex-wife Wanda King
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:20.779
    | text      = got control over Jack Ryan Limited Partnership, the entity that was used to publish the books
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:25.819
    | text      = written by other people with Tom's name on them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:28.939
    | text      = Jack Ryan Limited Partnership was an adjoint venture with S&R Literary Incorporated, an
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:34.039
    | text      = entity owned by Steve Pechenik.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:36.460
    | text      = With Clancy's ex-wife taking control of Jack Ryan Limited, Steve was now in business with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 01:29:44.579
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:45.760
    | text      = In January 2004, Tom had declared his decision that he no longer wanted his name to be on
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:50.720
    | text      = these books that he didn't write.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:53.500
    | text      = His ex-wife felt that this was a breach of his fiduciary duty, since it would severely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:00.100
    | text      = impact the value of this asset.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:01.859
    | text      = Right, of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:02.859
    | text      = The court sided with Wanda King, as did the appeals court, that he couldn't take his name
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:07.500
    | text      = off these books, which seems nightmarish.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:09.300
    | text      = That is, God, that's what, John Denver being sued for copyright violations on his own songs
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:15.779
    | text      = or whatever it was?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:17.420
    | text      = Yeah, I think their reasoning was basically like, in good faith, you made it totally fine
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:23.779
    | text      = for someone else to write books with your name on them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:27.060
    | text      = You can't change it now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:28.340
    | text      = This is just punitive in order to be a dick to your ex-wife.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:31.300
    | text      = Also, in the divorce, it came out that the reason for the separation was that Wanda had
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:35.220
    | text      = discovered that Clancy had cheated on her with a woman nicknamed Ping Pong, who he had
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = met on the internet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:40.340
    | text      = Ah, I did not know that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:42.420
    | text      = I was waiting for another classic Steve Pechenik insert into sentences.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:46.899
    | text      = No, very strange, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:49.439
    | text      = She divorced him when she found out that his friend, Steve Pechenik, killed Morrow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:53.460
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:54.460
    | text      = That was not it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:55.460
    | text      = It was a, quote, woman named Ping Pong.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:57.699
    | text      = Hey, you know what?

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:59.100
    | text      = Everybody got to go back and forth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I feel like there's an offensive story behind that that I'm just not going to dig into.

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = I have to assume.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:04.819
    | text      = Nope, I don't want to do it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:06.180
    | text      = When the chips were down and Clancy was trying to take his name off these books that he no
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:10.020
    | text      = longer had any control over because his wife was in charge of Jack Ryan Limited, Steve
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:14.539
    | text      = sided with King and testified against Clancy, alleging that his motivation to take his name
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = off the books was to hurt King financially.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:22.460
    | text      = From everything I can tell, there's no reason to give Steve any elevated status with Tom
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:26.739
    | text      = Clancy as if Steve was responsible for his success or anything like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:30.819
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:31.819
    | text      = He's not Jack Ryan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:32.819
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:33.819
    | text      = For God's sakes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:34.819
    | text      = I'm pretty sure Steve spun some great yarns that led to him being a collaborator with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:37.579
    | text      = Tom.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:38.579
    | text      = But gun to your head, do you know anything about the Op Center or Netforce books?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:43.779
    | text      = One of them, I assume, has something to do with the Internet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:47.859
    | text      = Maybe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:48.859
    | text      = And the other one is like, we're in the middle of this place.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:52.020
    | text      = We got to get stuff done.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:53.239
    | text      = You would be dead.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | timestamp = 01:31:58.539
    | text      = No.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:59.539
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:00.539
    | text      = God, that'd be great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:01.539
    | text      = I know the names of like four Tom Clancy books and they have nothing to do with Steve at
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:06.340
    | text      = all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:07.340
    | text      = None of the books that you know have anything to do with Steve.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:10.140
    | text      = I think I might actually read an international spy book about fishery violations.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I think that might actually be interesting.

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Could be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:19.819
    | text      = But it might interest you to know that Steve has a non-Tom Clancy related writing career
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:24.460
    | text      = as well.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:25.460
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:26.460
    | text      = In 1985, he released a book called The Mind Palace.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:28.979
    | text      = Then in 1989, he came out with Blood Heat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:31.979
    | text      = Maximum Vigilance was published in 1992, then Pax Pacifica in 1995.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:37.760
    | text      = These books have been reviewed as quote, bad, and quote, having no literary value.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:42.560
    | text      = But these are just the reviews of random people online, so maybe they're great books.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:45.739

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:47.739
    | text      = Could be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:48.739
    | text      = Now something I find interesting is how closely some of these books seem to match up with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:51.560
    | text      = Alex Jones' narratives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:53.060
    | text      = There it is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:54.939
    | text      = Some of them, Alex might have been inspired to believe, based on Steve.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:59.020
    | text      = For instance, Blood Heat is about an evil cabal working in a conspiracy to create a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:03.220
    | text      = mutated bioweapon which could make the bubonic plague even more transmittable.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Ooh, that is scary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:10.659
    | text      = Virus.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:11.659
    | text      = That?

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Bioweapons.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 01:33:14.659
    | text      = Controlled release.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = The Mind Palace has to do with psychiatry being used nefariously.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Pax Pacifica involves conspiracies and power struggles in China that ripple over into the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:24.539
    | text      = United States.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:26.039
    | text      = All these vaguely intersect with major Alex Jones narratives, but Steve's 1992 book, Maximum
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:31.859
    | text      = Vigilance, is perhaps the best example of his literature having strange parallels with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:36.579
    | text      = the things that he's told Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:39.420
    | text      = The central conflict in that book is about how a fictionalized version of President Bush
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:43.000
    | text      = was crazy and needed to be removed from office using the 25th Amendment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:48.220
    | text      = Interestingly, around the time of the book's release, Steve went around to all the media
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:55.220
    | text      = places that would talk to him, and he was out there just accusing George H.W. Bush of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:59.739
    | text      = being crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:00.739
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:01.739
    | text      = I have zero doubt that if Alex's show existed at that point, he would have used it as a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:05.000
    | text      = platform to spread the Bush is Crazy idea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:07.579
    | text      = For sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:08.579
    | text      = Steve's comments got him in some trouble, and he was reprimanded by the American Medical
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:11.579
    | text      = Association, which ultimately led to him leaving the American Medical Association.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:15.779
    | text      = Yeah, that'll do it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:17.619
    | text      = He said that Bush was, quote, clinically depressed, and obviously in the midst of a serious identity
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:21.899
    | text      = crisis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:22.979
    | text      = No one else was putting forth these sorts of accusations or gossip, and it's super relevant
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
